SEARCH
Package Repositories

Interface Repositories<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity managed by this Repositories.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDAO, CatDAO, MasterDAO
public interface Repositories<T>
Represents a generic Repositories (Data Access Object) interface for managing entities of type T.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    closeCurrentSessionWithTransaction()
    Closes the current session and commits the transaction.
    void
    delete(T t)
    Deletes an entity.

    Retrieves an entity by its unique identifier.

    Retrieves all entities of type T.
    void
    openCurrentSessionWithTransaction()
    Opens a new session with an active transaction.

    Saves or updates an entity.
    T

    Updates an existing entity.

  • Method Details

    • get

      Optional<T> get(Long id)
      Retrieves an entity by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the entity.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the entity if found, otherwise empty.

    • getAll

      List<T> getAll()
      Retrieves all entities of type T.
      Returns:
      A list containing all entities of type T.

    • save

      T save(T t)
      Saves or updates an entity.
      Parameters:
      t - The entity to be saved or updated.
      Returns:
      The saved or updated entity.

    • update

      T update(T t)
      Updates an existing entity.
      Parameters:
      t - The entity to be updated.
      Returns:
      The updated entity.

    • delete

      void delete(T t)
      Deletes an entity.
      Parameters:
      t - The entity to be deleted.

    • openCurrentSessionWithTransaction

      void openCurrentSessionWithTransaction()
      Opens a new session with an active transaction.

    • closeCurrentSessionWithTransaction

      void closeCurrentSessionWithTransaction()
      Closes the current session and commits the transaction.
